member.name: T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource
member.summary: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.#ctor(System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the provided connection.
member.param: An to the Entity Data Model (EDM).

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the collection.
member.returns: true if the control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.exception: When the property is set to true and the property is not null.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the collection.
member.returns: true if the control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.exception: When the property is set to true and the property is not null.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.
member.returns: true if the user can page through the data; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.AutoSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports sorting the data at run time.
member.returns: true if the user can sort the data; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandParameters
member.summary: Gets the parameter collection for the query.
member.returns: A that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText
member.summary: Gets or sets an Entity SQL command that defines the query.
member.returns: A string value that is the Entity SQL query.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string that is used to execute the query.
member.returns: The connection string for the query.

member.summary: Occurs after an object has been deleted from the data source.

member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a delete operation.
member.returns: The parameters that are used during a delete operation.

member.summary: Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be deleted through the control.
member.returns: true if automatic delete operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableFlattening
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether you want to turn off wrapper creation.
member.returns: True if the properties will be flattened; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableInsert
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be added through the control.
member.returns: true if automatic insert operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EnableUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be modified through the control.
member.returns: true if automatic update operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entity set used by the control.
member.returns: The entity set name.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.
member.returns: The filter expression.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.GetView(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
member.returns: The that is associated with the control.
member.param: The name of the view to retrieve. Because the control supports only one view, is ignored.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.GetViewNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the control.
member.returns: An that contains the names of the views associated with the control.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.GroupBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.
member.returns: The GROUP BY clause.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Include
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.
member.returns: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.
member.returns: true if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.summary: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object. This object is accessible through the property.

member.name: T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException
member.summary: Represents errors that occur when validating properties of a dynamic data source.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.
member.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The object that holds the serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.

member.summary: Gets the exceptions that occur when a new or edited data field is validated.
member.returns: A collection that contains all the exceptions that occurred.

member.name: T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView
member.summary: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform queries and other operations against entity data.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanDelete
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the delete operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanInsert
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the insert operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging of retrieved data.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.CanUpdate
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the update operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.
